org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core

Class SimEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<SimEvent>

    public class SimEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<SimEvent>
    This class represents a simulation event which is passed between the entities in the simulation.
    Author:
    Costas Simatos
    See Also:
    Simulation, SimEntity
